strategy: Tyranid armies have a Strategy Rating of 1.
Initiative: The Cult Company and all Cult Support formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and are subject to the 'Brood Brothers' special rule. All other formations have an Initative Rating of 1+.

sections.name: Cult Core Formations
sections.description: One Nexus Brood formation must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Nexus Brood
formations.units: One Genestealer Patriarch, three Genestealers, three Hybrid Acolytes
extraUnits: Add four Coven Limousines (75 points) or four Coven Goliaths (125 points)
Replace three Genestealers with three Hybrid Acolytes, or three Hybrid Acolytes with three Genestealers: Free

formations.name: Cult Company
formations.units: One Hybrid Primus, nine Cult Infantry
extraUnits: Add two Cult Fire Support: 50 points
Add three Cult Leman Russ or Cult Leman Russ Demolishers: 150 points
Add enough Cult Chimeras to transport the entire formation with no space left over: 25 points each
Add up to two Cult Hellhounds: 25 points each

sections.name: Coven Vanguard Formations
sections.description: One Coven Vanguard formation may be taken for each Cult Core formation.

sections.name: Coven Ambush Formations
sections.description: One Coven Ambush formation may be taken for each Coven Vanguard formation.

sections.name: Cult Support Formations
sections.description: One Cult Support formation may be taken per Cult Core formation.

formations.name: Cult Super-Heavy Platoon
formations.units: One Coven Locus character, one Cult Baneblade or Cult Stormblade
extraUnits: Replace the Cult Baneblade or Cult Stormblade with a Cult Shadowsword: 25 points

formations.name: Cult Leman Russ Platoon
formations.units: One Coven Locus character, six Cult Leman Russ or Cult Leman Russ Demolishers

formations.name: Cult Basilisk Battery
formations.units: One Coven Locus character, three Cult Basilisks

formations.name: Cult Mechanized Platoon
formations.units: One Coven Locus character, six Cult Infantry, three Cult Chimeras
extraUnits: Add up to two Cult Hellhounds: 25 points each

formations.name: Cult Flak Battery
formations.units: One Coven Locus character, three Cult Hydras

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: Coven Flak
items.description: Add up to two Coven Technicals
